Spare_Summer.formula: Single rating: (rating - demand) * SPARE_MULTIPLIER; Multiple: ((sum(ratings) - max(rating)) - demand) * SPARE_MULTIPLIER

Spare_Winter.formula: Single rating: (rating - demand) * SPARE_MULTIPLIER; Multiple: ((sum(ratings) - max(rating)) - demand) * SPARE_MULTIPLIER

Firm_Capacity.description: Firm capacity based on transformer ratings with diversity factor
Firm_Capacity.formula: Scenario-based: Multiple ratings: ((sum(ratings) - max(rating)) * 0.96), Single rating: (rating * 0.96), Final: min(summer_result, winter_result)

Trans1_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 1, NULL if missing

Trans2_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 2, NULL if missing

Trans3_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 3, NULL if missing

Trans4_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 4, NULL if missing

Trans1_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 1, NULL if missing

Trans2_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 2, NULL if missing

Trans3_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 3, NULL if missing

Trans4_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 4, NULL if missing

Trans5_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 5, NULL if missing

Trans5_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 5, NULL if missing

Trans6_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 6, NULL if missing

Trans6_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 6, NULL if missing

Trans7_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 7, NULL if missing

Trans8_Summer.formula: Extracted from transratingsummer column, position 8, NULL if missing

Trans7_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 7, NULL if missing

Trans8_Winter.formula: Extracted from transratingwinter column, position 8, NULL if missing

Total Gen <1 (MW).formula: ECR < 1MVA Already connected + ECR < 1MVA Accepted to connect

Total Gen >1 (MW).formula: ECR > 1MVA Already connected + ECR > 1MVA Accepted to connect

Generation_Headroom_MW.formula: Generation_Capacity - (ECR > 1MVA Already connected + ECR > 1MVA Accepted to connect + ECR < 1MVA Already connected + ECR < 1MVA Accepted to connect)

Deviation_Percentage.description: Percentage deviation between Installed Capacity MVA and Max Total Gen
